alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 13 at 11:27PM CDT until May 15 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DRY CONDITIONS TOMORROW WITH POTENTIALLY CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER FOR MONDAY... Dry conditions are forecast Monday with gusty winds. Westerly winds may gust up to 30 mph at times. A Red Flag Warning may be needed. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTH CENTRAL MN... * AFFECTED AREA...In Minnesota, Koochiching, North St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake, North Itasca and Central St. Louis. * WINDS...West 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the lower 70s. * IMPACTS...Any fires will grow and spread quickly.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
